snippet: GORFINKLE--Sara A.,of New York City, died on January 11, 2016, following complications after surgery. Ms. Gorfinkle was born in Boston, MA, on July 10, 1932. A graduate of Boston University, she moved to New York in the 1950s, where she became a recognized etiquette authority. Memorial services will be held in New York and Boston. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GORFINKLE--Sara A.,of New York City, died on January 11, 2016, following complications after surgery. Ms. Gorfinkle was born in Boston, MA, on July 10, 1932. A graduate of Boston University, she moved to New York in the 1950s, where she became a recognized etiquette authority. Memorial services will be held in New York and Boston. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GORFINKLE, SARA A.
